title: Drawing with type on your iPhone
content:
Mobile devices are not just for consuming information, increasingly smartphones are letting users create content. This is certainly more of an entertainment app than a professional design tool, but for a buck, why not?

The [TypeDrawing](http://web.archive.org/web/20131017030036/http:/itunes.apple.com/WebObjects/MZStore.woa/wa/viewSoftware?id=314072879&mt=8) app ($1 USD) for iPhone is a good, interesting example.

[
 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20131017030036im_/http:/typophile.com/files/typedrawing_iphone_3908.png)
](http://web.archive.org/web/20131017030036/http:/itunes.apple.com/WebObjects/MZStore.woa/wa/viewSoftware?id=314072879&mt=8)

Check out the [TypeDrawing Flickr Pool](http://web.archive.org/web/20131017030036/http:/www.flickr.com/groups/typedrawing).
author: Joe Pemberton
